column5: Anyone recommend drive to resorts in this area.Anyone stay atBergmann`s on sturgeon lake.Looking to go in end of july withwife and son.Advice or comments needed.Thanks

I believe the lodge is a few miles before Rusty Myers Flying. I haven't been there but hear it is an ok place to stay. If you want to fly out there are some real great out posts in the area. I know Richard Kungle has a great place. You can get info at www.wildewoodflyin.com or www.rustymyers.com about the area. Hope that helps.
